bloom.name: Bloom Cafe
bloom.about: A cozy neighborhood cafe serving artisanal coffee and fresh pastries in a warm, welcoming atmosphere perfect for work or relaxation.
bloom.amenities: free Wi-Fi, indoor seating, wheelchair accessibility, and a gender-neutral washroom

balzac.name: Balzac's Coffee Roasters
balzac.address: 215 King St W, Toronto, ON M5H 3M2
balzac.hours: Monday-Friday 6:30 AM - 9:00 PM, Saturday-Sunday 7:00 AM - 9:00 PM
balzac.about: Premium coffee roasters with a focus on fair trade and organic beans, offering a sophisticated coffee experience in downtown Toronto.
balzac.amenities: Free WiFi, Power Outlets, Outdoor Seating, Takeaway Available, Card Payment Accepted

fusettes.name: Fusettes Cafe
fusettes.hours: Monday-Friday 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday-Sunday 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
fusettes.about: European-style cafe with authentic French pastries and artisanal coffee in the heart of Greektown.
fusettes.amenities: Free WiFi, Limited Power Outlets, Outdoor Patio, French Pastries, Cash & Card Accepted
